caption:
b'What does an inclusive environment look like?

Today we celebrate the International Day of Persons with Disabilities, and this year it reminds us that \xe2\x80\x9cNot all disabilities are visible\xe2\x80\x9d.

We want to foster a workplace and culture that breaks down barriers, physical and mental, focusing on the recognition of wider social needs and responsibilities. An inclusive workplace is the result of a commitment to create structures, practices and attitudes that allow persons of all, diverse abilities to fully participate and contribute.

#IDPD #NotAllDisabilitiesAreVisible #BeBoldForInclusion'

b'The @Nasdaq Tower in Times Square, New York, lit up with Generali\xe2\x80\x99s Diversity & Inclusion commitment as part of the Advancing Equality Tower Campaign.

At Generali, we are proud to champion Diversity & Inclusion, and build people from all different backgrounds into the leaders of the Insurance industry.

It is our differences that make the difference. 

Thank you to Nasdaq for Advancing Equality and helping us promote #BeBoldForInclusion.

#LifetimePartner #Generali2021 #Generali4Sustainability'

b'An innovative system of anti-flooding tanks is being built at the entrances of the Procuratie Vecchie, the future home of @thehumansafetynet in the emblematic Piazza San Marco in Venice, to keep high tides at bay with effective and environmentally friendly materials.

The intervention is part of Generali Real Estate\xe2\x80\x99s response to physical climate risk, which is based on climate modelling datasets, hazard assessment algorithms and risk maps that allow to forecast risk exposure and identify appropriate adaptation measures.

#Generali4Sustainability #buildingthehome #THSNInAction'

b"The 2nd phase of our Global Brand Campaign is being launched across markets, celebrating our attitude that defines how we do things: it's about having heart, being passionate and human. \n\n#WeAreAllAboutYou #LifetimePartner"

b'\xe2\x80\x9cAs an agent, my job is to protect families and properties. So for me, getting involved to help vulnerable families is simply a natural extension of my job.\xe2\x80\x9d

Christian is a French agent based in Bordeaux who decided to become a sponsor for the local home of @thehumansafetynet, \xe2\x80\x9cLa Maison des Familles.\xe2\x80\x9d Among other initiatives, Christian initiated a fundraising campaign that enabled vulnerable families to enjoy a weekend trip, during which they could spend together some time away from everyday difficulties and create new, stronger connections.

#LifetimePartner #THSN #THSN4Families #THSNinAction #peoplehelpingpeople'

b'Generali Real Estate\xe2\x80\x99s flagship building in London, FenCourt, continues to gather prestigious recognitions!

- Winner of the \xe2\x80\x98Excellence in Design Award\xe2\x80\x99, in the "Professional Large Project" category, by The American Institute of Architects (AIA) UK Chapter.

- FenCourt\xe2\x80\x99s \xe2\x80\x9cThe Garden at 120\xe2\x80\x9d, the City of London\xe2\x80\x99s largest rooftop public space, is the winner of the Green Good Design Award.

Congratulations to the team!

#Generali4Sustainability #realestate #design'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cVolunteering not only lets us give something back from a professional point of view, but involves a lot of human touch. These entrepreneurs gave me so much in terms of enthusiasm, new hope and a different way of looking at things!\xe2\x80\x9d

Carlo Trabattoni, CEO of Generali Investments Partners, has been personally engaged in skilled volunteering in Zurich with @thehumansafetynet. Working together with a group of colleagues, he supported refugees in developing their business ideas and provided advice on how to find future partners or investors.

#LifetimePartner #THSN #THSN4Refugees #THSNinAction #peoplehelpingpeople'

b'Generali is proud to support LGBTQI+ colleagues by launching "We Proud", the new Employee Resource Group (ERG) whose mission is to support LGBTQI+ employees and their allies in order to improve workplace inclusion, raise awareness on the challenges LGBTQI+ employees face and improve understanding of the needs of a diverse workforce and customer base.

To be sustainable and reach our ambition to become Lifetime Partner to our customers, we must further embrace the differences that make the difference.

#GeneraliWeProud #LGBTQIinclusioncounts #BeBoldForInclusion #LifetimePartner #Generali4Sustainability'

b"Specialised workers, building engineers, project architects, art restorers, ancient knowledge, modern tools, human passion: discover the progress of a respectful restoration inside the Procuratie Vecchie in St. Mark's Square in Venice.

At the end of 2021, this will become the home of @thehumansafetynet, a place open to everyone willing to positively impact on the lives of people living in vulnerable contexts worldwide.

#buildingthehome #THSNInAction"

b'\xe2\x80\x9cThe Centre and Casa Zoe have become like a family to us.\xe2\x80\x9d

A new, big family is what Simona found at @thehumansafetynet\xe2\x80\x99s partner @missionbambini centre in Moncalieri (Turin), where she had the chance to meet other parents, share advice and experiences, and enjoy the time with her daughter Greta.

#LifetimePartner #THSNinAction #THSN4Families #peoplehelpingpeople @generaliitalia'

b'Given the weather conditions, the Barcolana regatta was canceled. In the words of our Chairman Gabriele Galateri di Genola, "safety is the first condition for a successful regatta. The message is that it has still been possible to organise and share an event of sport and fun, despite the difficult year. During the past days, Barcolana successfully managed many events that spoke about the territory, environment and culture. This is important. I congratulate the organisation, the law enforcement and public and private institutions, which worked together to make this wonderful event possible. Goodbye then!".\n\n#Barcolana52 #LifetimePartner #Generali4Sport #Generali4Sustainability'

b"The Generali's wind vane stands out on the top of the Barcolana Infopoint in Piazza Unit\xc3\xa0, Trieste. This year, we have set up a weather video point with real-time updates on the wind, tides and general conditions for both sailors and the general public.
In this edition, organised in full compliance with COVID-19 measures, we have paid special attention to the local area and its relationship with the sea.

#Barcolana52 #LifetimePartner #Generali4Sport #Generali4Sustainability"

b'@thehumansafetynet celebrates its 3rd anniversary! Three years which transformed an ambition into a lively and impactful movement of people helping people already active in 23 countries.

Watch the dialogue with Simone Bemporad and Emma Ursich expressing this journey, the concrete impact for the communities, response to Covid-19 and ambitions for the next three years and beyond.

#3yearsofTHSN #THSNinaction'

b'Sub-Saharan Africa has the highest percentage of people in the world without electricity: 600 million out of 1 billion inhabitants. Today, more and more independent power producers collaborate with local governments to expand the installed electricity capacity in the continent.

Such private-public partnerships can compensate for the drastic energy shortages in Africa, free up public resources to be invested in other areas where the private sector is less effective, reduce electricity costs and make the renewable energy market in Africa sustainable.

Discover more in our #BollettinoGenerali. Link in bio.

#FutureInYourDailyLife #Generali4Sustainability'

b'Lockdown and necessary protective measures have produced serious effects on economic and political stability throughout the world. The turbulence in financial markets is proving the importance of our asset allocation strategy to guarantee solidity to our customers and to support economic recovery.

We also believe that international dialogue among decision-makers is key to foster effective global governance and overcome common challenges.

We have never stopped, discover our strategy to #ReshapeValue.

#Generali4Sustainability'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cI can look ahead to the future with confidence.\xe2\x80\x9d

In Ethiopia, Teferi repaired used wheelchairs to give them to people in need, but fear of political persecution forced him to flee to Switzerland. There, he was one of the beneficiaries of @thehumansafetynet \xe2\x80\x99s programme \xe2\x80\x9cFor Refugee Start-Ups\xe2\x80\x9d, which helps refugees start businesses and build new livelihoods, contribute to the local economy and restore personal dignity.

Today, Teferi\xe2\x80\x99s association Dreisprung (\xe2\x80\x9cTriple Jump\xe2\x80\x9d) provides professional training, life and language skills to young African refugees, and the mobility aids and hospital equipment they produce are sent to the Horn of Africa.\xc2\xa0

#LifetimePartner #THSN #THSN4Refugees #THSNinAction #peoplehelpingpeople

@generali_switzerland'

b'In a context of social distancing, such as the COVID-19 emergency, the acceleration of digital transformation has proved to be essential like never before.

We have thus relied on the digitization of our commercial network and our operating model to be at the side of the customers even remotely, while ensuring the safety of our colleagues. 

We also keep leveraging digital innovation and smart collaboration to develop new insurance solutions and provide technologically advanced services in many areas: from smart home and mobility to digitally empowered health&wellness programs.

We have never stopped, discover our strategy to #ReshapeValue.

#Generali4Sustainability'

b'State, Markets and the Community are the three pillars of our modern societies. But there is a widening gap between them, feeding into the current crisis of the liberal system and the populist reaction against globalisation.

This is what economist Raghuram Rajan claims in his recently published book \xe2\x80\x9cThe Third Pillar: How Markets and the State Leave the Community Behind\xe2\x80\x9d. According to Rajan, reinvigorating the Third Pillar by strengthening community relations - currently weakened by state and market -, establishing forms of \xe2\x80\x9cinclusive localism\xe2\x80\x9d and restructuring the social contract, is crucial to rebuild the democracy of the liberal market and overcome the crisis.

Discover more in our #BollettinoGenerali. Link in bio.

#FutureInYourDailyLife #Generali4Sustainability'

b"In recent months, older citizens are not just struggling with greater health risks: isolation has amplified the challenges for their autonomy and financial protection.

That's why we are providing solutions to complement their social security needs and we are investing in key sectors for keeping the elderly healthy and with a high quality of life.

We have never stopped, discover our strategy to #ReshapeValue.

#Generali4Sustainability"

b'"When you are there with them, you can feel that the most significant help is not to send them money but to spend time together. Time means more than money."

Along with other colleagues, Anna, an IT security specialist at @generaliceska, is engaged as volunteer for @thehumansafetynet\xe2\x80\x99s partner Vita et Futura Children\xe2\x80\x99s Centre in Prague.

Since the beginning, Anna has supported the Centre many times, bringing her ideas and passion to help the children while enjoying an enriching and rewarding experience.

#LifetimePartner #THSN #THSNinAction #THSN4Families #peoplehelpingpeople'

b'While the lockdown measures taken in many parts of the world to fight the pandemic brought down greenhouse gas emissions, the restart of the economy could soon bring us back to previous levels of pollution. A more incisive action is needed to flatten also the emission curve.

We are implementing a bold action plan that focuses on clean energy and support to a green transition because there won\xe2\x80\x99t be a vaccine to protect us against climate change.

We have never stopped, discover our strategy to #ReshapeValue. 

#Generali4Sustainability'

b'Visionary, futuristic and pioneering. Just steps away from the clouds, skyscrapers have transformed our cities\xe2\x80\x99 skylines and celebrate the science and engineering behind these architectural marvels.

Like our #GeneraliTower in the @CityLifeMilano district, we stand tall and ready to face new challenges, with a great vision for the future and a strong commitment to our goals and values.

#SkyscraperDay #CityLife #Generali2021'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cI like to organize volunteering activities with my colleagues. I always tell them: help others and the surrounding community. It costs you nothing \xe2\x80\x93 just a little of your time \xe2\x80\x93 yet it does a great deal of good.\xe2\x80\x9d

Peter is a Generali employee in Slovakia who is skilled at woodworking, a hobby that he decided to use to make is contribution to @thehumansafetynet: he designed unique Montessori wooden toys that have become a key part of daily activities to support children\xe2\x80\x99s development through play.

#LifetimePartner #THSN #THSN4Families #THSNinAction #peoplehelpingpeople'

b'"I wasn\xe2\x80\x99t sure I was strong enough to be a single parent."

After losing her husband, Jelena found herself struggling to raise her daughter alone. Thanks to the \xe2\x80\x9cSupport, not perfection\xe2\x80\x9d programme organized by @novakfoundation, The Human Safety Net\xe2\x80\x99s partner in Serbia, she could rely on the support of other parents and experts, and learn how to overcome everyday challenges helping her child to gain confidence and self-esteem.

The \xe2\x80\x9cSupport, not perfection\xe2\x80\x9d workshops were organized in\xc2\xa0 the framework of \xe2\x80\x9cFor Families\xe2\x80\x9d, @thehumansafetynet\xe2\x80\x99s programme that relies on an international coalition of partners to support parents in the first six years of their children\xe2\x80\x99s life, to lay the strongest possible foundations for their future.

#LifetimePartner #THSN #THSN4Families #THSNinaction #peoplehelpingpeople @generalisrbija'

b'At the height of the Covid-19 emergency, we created the \xe2\x82\xac100 million Extraordinary International Fund to restore trust and optimism for families and businesses.
Protecting people and understanding their needs is at the heart of all we do, as a #LifetimePartner.

#WereAllAboutYou'

b'Small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) and their workers were hard-hit by the Covid-19 outbreak and related economic downturn.

Urgent interventions are needed to support them, given their importance: in fact, SMEs make up 99% of businesses in the EU and account for 60% of the global workforce. They play a vital role in social stability, equitable growth and poverty reduction, and form the backbone of the working middle class in most countries.

To promote SMEs and the role they play, Generali has launched EnterPRIZE, the International award for the best sustainable SMEs in the fields of environment and climate change, health and safety, employee welfare, and sustainable innovation.

Discover more on the contribution of SMEs to the development of corporate welfare and the integration of sustainability in the real economy in our #BollettinoGenerali.

#Generali4Sustainability #FutureInYourDailyLife'

b'We are excited to launch today our first-ever Global Advertising Campaign, to celebrate and empower our 155,000 agents, illustrating how Generali is a true Lifetime Partner to customers.\nThe campaign puts Agents centre-stage and offers them the unique possibility to tailor their own local campaigns to portray themselves as the true reference points for informed advice for their customers around the clock. \n#WereAllAboutYou #LifetimePartner'

b'The modern Knights of the Round Table are faced with unprecedented times.

Business can play a fundamental role in addressing the health and economic impacts of the #Covid19 crisis. Just a few months ago, the American Business Roundtable, which represents the largest corporations in the US, published a statement that was signed by over 200 companies, announcing the redefinition of the purpose of the corporation.

Amidst today\xe2\x80\x99s uncertainty, it is all the more necessary to reinvent economic systems to adequately address the major challenges of our time. Delivering shareholder value is no longer enough: new models of development must place economic and social well-being first to ensure the long-term durability of economic systems and generate value for all their participants, including communities, employees, suppliers and customers.

Discover more in our #BollettinoGenerali on www.generali.com.'

b"@thehumansafetynet\xe2\x80\x99s first activity report 2019 is now available! Discover THNS's journey since 2017, the human stories, what has been achieved and learned along the way.
Discover more on at www.thehumansafetynet.org 

#THSNinAction"

b'The Fondazione Giorgio Cini monumental complex on San Giorgio Island and the Palazzo Cini Gallery in Venice reopen for guided tours in partnership with Generali, offering the chance to visit prestigious art collections and the \xe2\x80\x98Piranesi Roma Basilico\xe2\x80\x99 exhibition.

Generali\xe2\x80\x99s support to @fondazionegcini and @palazzo_cini is part of a wider project to protect and promote the cultural heritage of Venice; the initiative joins the recent reopening of the Royal Gardens of Piazza San Marco, run by the Venice Gardens Foundation in partnership with Generali, and the restoration of the Procuratie Vecchie.

:camera: Matteo De Fina

#LifetimePartner #Generali2021 #ValoreCultura'

b'Generali Polska donated over \xe2\x82\xac350,000 to purchase lung ventilators for Polish hospitals in collaboration with Caritas.

The donation was made possible thanks to the Extraordinary International Fund for the #Covid19 emergency; the last one of the ventilators was delivered to the Childrens\xe2\x80\x99 Health Center in Warsaw, while hospitals in Pozna\xc5\x84, Lublin, Szczecin, Wa\xc5\x82cz, W\xc5\x82oszczowa, Toru\xc5\x84 and E\xc5\x82k have already received these devices.

Link in bio. #LifetimePartner'

b'We celebrate the generosity of our colleagues @generali_deutschland who have voluntarily waived part of their salary and donated around \xe2\x82\xac 750,000 to the German Caritas Association @caritas.de for the #Covid19 emergency fund.

The donation will be passed on to institutions and organizations which will use the money for social projects at all locations of Generali in Germany.

#LifetimePartner'

b'Resilience is about innovating :light_bulb: with a human touch :palms_up_together:

We have been discussing the extent of natural disasters for a long time, and this issue has never been as current as it is today. Why not reduce the risks (and costs) instead of waiting to be left with no choice but take remedial actions?

In the case of climate change, studies have shown that every dollar invested in prevention and adaptation measures would produce savings of 7 dollars in assistance and reconstruction.

These considerations, together with the effects of the current #Covid19 emergency, teach us an important lesson for the future.

Discover more about the advantages of risk prevention in our #BollettinoGenerali. Link in bio.

#Generali4Sustainability #FutureInYourDailyLife'

b"\xe2\x80\x98Join us as a digital volunteer because each one's grain of sand can contribute to making the change\xe2\x80\x99\nWhile usual face-to-face activities had to be put on hold, volunteers from Argentina, Serbia and many other countries supported their THSN partners at distance by becoming digital volunteers. They filmed themselves while doing simple and engaging activities parents can do at home with their children, such as singing, reading, dancing or playing football. NGOs can use the videos and propose them to families to keep an active contact and continue part of the programs. All videos are being collected in a global library of meaningful activities for families and children available to all THSN partners.\n#THSNinAction #THSN4Families #peoplehelpingpeople"

b'A big shout out to our #SmartWorkingLions, who perfectly embody our company culture based on our Lifetime Partner Behaviours: ownership, simplification, human touch and innovation.

While part of our People Strategy long before the COVID-19 outbreak, the emergency has accelerated our transition to the smart working model, which has played a key role in allowing Generali to react quickly and effectively to protect the health of our people while preserving business continuity.

Smart working is the default solution also in \xe2\x80\x98Phase 2\xe2\x80\x99, and we will continue to rely on it in the longer term. This is possible also thanks to our people, and their willingness to be in charge of what they do, to act proactively and to take responsibility for achieving our ambitious goals.

#LifetimePartner #Generali2021'

b'World Environment Day :globe_showing_Europe-Africa: reminds us of the urgent need to act for the protection of our planet, first of all to fight climate change. It is an important opportunity for Generali: to reflect on our commitments, the results achieved and what we can do even more. Starting with concrete daily actions - in six years we have reduced GHG emissions from our offices and business trips by 20% - to our commitment to make our investment portfolio climate-neutral by 2050. We are already supporting the energy transition with our financial strength and insurance protection. 
Find out more at generali.com.

#WorldEnvironmentDay #ForNature #Generali4Sustainability'

b'Among the actions linked to the International Extraordinary Fund of up to 100 million euro, Generali launched \xe2\x80\x9cGenerali Health Professionals\xe2\x80\x9d, an initiative dedicated to the Health sector in some of the countries where we operate. 
The aim is to provide free COVID-19 insurance coverage or support to the brave Health sector professionals, who have been operating under enormous pressure and making a priceless contribution to the local societies during the #COVID19 emergency. 
Link in bio.

#LifetimePartner'

b"Today we celebrate the International Day Against Homophobia, Transphobia, Biphobia. \nGenerali is committed to respecting LGBT people's rights and eliminating discrimination, supporting LGBT employees and valuing our diverse ecosystem of customers, suppliers and communities."

b'Generali, since the beginning of the #Covid19 emergency, is taking action all around the world to protect and assist its employees, customers and partners.
Link in bio to discover more.
.
.
#LifetimePartner
#Generali4Sustainability'

b'Social distancing required to rethink the way @thehumansafetynet supports the people it helps. Working together with its NGO Partners, many new initiatives have started, from fundraising to digital coaching, to make sure each family, child and refugee can continue to benefit from our support.\n\n#THSNinaction'

b'The first 500 thousand medical masks for the Italian Civil Protection have arrived. 
This is the first batch of 20 million professional masks for workers involved in the #Covid19 health emergency purchased by Generali and @protezionecivileit, thanks to our Extraordinary International Fund for the Covid-19 emergency.
The masks will be delivered to health workers in all Italian regions.

Link in bio for more info.

#LifetimePartner'

b'We are all stuck together in this emergency. But spring is coming again, and soon we will enjoy a new season, stronger than before.
.
.
:camera_with_flash: @elisabetta_ceci'

b'Generali supports the health workers who are tirelessly dealing with the #Covid19 health emergency. In the next few weeks, a supply of around 20 million masks will be delivered to these operators, thanks to the contribution of Generali to Italy\xe2\x80\x99s Civil Protection Department, within the context of our Extraordinary International Fund for the Covid-19 emergency.

Generali has contributed with a donation of 14 million euro, on a total of around 28 million euro - the other half committed by the Civil Protection. This effective example of public-private partnership shows how useful and important continuous dialogue is between the State and the companies involved in supporting, in various ways, the pandemic emergency.

For more details link in bio.

#LifetimePartner'

b'Being Lifetime Partner to our people and customers is to us of the utmost importance and, today more than ever, it means building trust and joining forces to overcome the emergency. With the outbreak of the COVID-19 epidemic, we have immediately taken action to protect the health of our people, be it employees, agents or business partners, and to preserve services continuity.

Discover more about our global action:\xc2\xa0https://bit.ly/GlobalActionCovid19

#LifetimePartner'

b'Generali creates an Extraordinary International Fund of up to 100 million Euro dedicated to the fight against the #Covid19 emergency on an international level.

As part of the 100 million euro plan: :round_pushpin: Up to 30 million Euro will immediately be utilized for the Health Emergency in Italy. :round_pushpin: The fund will also help restart the economic recovery. :megaphone: "We all have to work together to fight this battle. We are a part of both Italian and European history, and in line with our heritage, we have and we will do everything we can to benefit the well-being of all.\xe2\x80\x9d
Philippe Donnet, Generali Group CEO.

Read the full press release --> bit.ly/COVIDGeneraliFund'

b'During all of March, the Diversity and Inclusion month, Generali celebrates the many differences our Group is made up of.

Be Bold for Inclusion means leveraging on our different mindsets, preferences, cultures, because we know that it\xe2\x80\x99s our differences that make the difference, for our people, for our customers and for our communities!

#BeBoldForInclusion #Generali4Sustainability'

b'Lights out!... and switch on your attention to the planet! :globe_showing_Americas: For the second year in a row, Generali Tower turns off its lights for #Milluminodimeno. \nJoin us in lighting up the future!\n#Generali4Sustainability'

b'The rise of sustainable business and the responsible consumer will save us.

The ongoing impoverishment of our planet affects not only our resources, but also our rights, our opportunities, and the struggle for equality. Hope lies in a new culture of responsible business and consumption, a new \xe2\x80\x9cimpact economy\xe2\x80\x9d that is led by those same millennials who are driving the change in demand.

The reform at the heart of this new economy is focusing the gaze of the financial and business sectors towards environmental and social concerns: an economy that serves humanity as a whole is able to create long-term economic value, protect the environment and create value for both clients and employees, investing in the business of tomorrow and planting the seeds of a sustainable future.

Discover more in our #BollettinoGenerali. Link in bio :index_pointing_up_selector: #FutureInYourDailyLife'

b'Cleaning up the tower.

#Repost @citylifemilano with @make_repost
\xe3\x83\xbb\xe3\x83\xbb\xe3\x83\xbb
:camera_with_flash: @mitaka_neverdead'

b'Last weekend @generali_deutschland opened the first chapter of "Generali moves Germany" in winter sports. 
For the first time, we not only moved Germany at top running events and in tennis, but also as official partner of the legendary Kandahar Ski World Cup in Garmisch-Partenkirchen. 
The "Kandahar" is regarded as one of the most challenging race tracks in the Alpine Ski World Cup and is one of the highlights in the FIS racing calendar, alongside the downhill runs in Kitzb\xc3\xbchel and Wengen. 
And already next weekend, the high-class women's race with Generali as leading partner of the event will continue at the same location. 
#Generali4Sport .
.
:camera_with_flash: @berlinburnt
:camera_with_flash: GEPA pictures'

b'A Sport Room, an Energy Room and a Mindfulness Room, even a F1 simulator and a relax area: the Energy Hub in Generali Tower, Milan, is the brand new space devoted to our employee well-being and prevention. \nOpen to all employees to encourage a healthy and sustainable lifestyle, the Energy Hub leverages the distinctive skills of the innovative platform of Generali Welion and the expertise of @medicine_exercise.\nThe new space is the latest stage in our welfare journey for Generali Group employees, in line with our strategy #Generali2021, and comprising also an Energy Check-Up program, smart working and innovative workspaces.'

b'What are the keys to reconcile economic development with an eco-friendly approach? \nDiscover them in our new Bollettino - Sustainability.\nLink in bio :index_pointing_up_selector: #FutureInYourDailyLife #BollettinoGenerali'

b"Sustainability is one of the main themes discussed at the 50th World Economic Forum Annual Meeting.\nLike never before, the urgency to act on climate change has become evident, and financial institutions, organizations and companies have the power to impact positively on society.\nThis year, in our spaces in Davos, our Group CEO Philippe Donnet, along with Chairman Gabriele Galateri di Genola and Generali's top managers, will discuss how business innovation, Socially responsible investing and the relationship between private and public institutions can help building a better future."
